EmailTemplate.description: ADRAS software required specific customer Q&A in order to complete quote request
EmailTemplate.name: ADRAS Q&A
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber}{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}{!Case.Contact}{!Case.Product_Part__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Ground Support Solutions. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We have evaluated your request and will provide a finalized quote once you have an opportunity to provide the below information.
In order to identify the database to be used with the ADRAS software for the FDR readout, we need to know:
· target aircraft type: · DFDAU data frame definition and/or target data rate (words per second)
o flight data acquisition system configuration o supplier’s identification o hardware P/N o software P/N
As soon as this information is received, we can provide finalized pricing.
We look forward to hearing from you soon!
Best Regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Ground Support Solutions
